channel.title: Why doesn‚Äôt Auxy release the software to make your own private sound packs?
channel.description: I am try to find a solution on adding my own instruments to auxy and have searched high and low but haven‚Äôt found anything simple. Auxy though has everything we need to do such a thing why not release it to the public instead of limiting us to one sound pack every two months?! Technically they‚Äôve said it themselves their mission is to create the best music producing app for mobile and then release it to the world.

item.title: Why doesn‚Äôt Auxy release the software to make your own private sound packs?
item.dc:creator: Aklibs
item.description:
I have already clarified it over hereüëáüèº

New app for Computers specifically for adding your own instruments to Auxy? Auxy Feedback
I think Melodic Sampler is the answer of it, there is no need of separate application. Melodic Sampler can be implemented inside Auxy app. But if are saying that you want to make your own SoundPack and need a software for it, So let me tell you that as far as I know Developer already have such kind of software by which they make and provide us monthly soundpacks. And I‚Äôve read before many community members wanted to contribute making soundpacks for Auxy and also requested for such software b‚Ä¶

But However if they change their mind and release it to the public for $500, would you buy it for making soundpacks
